mapper.select: SELECT A.ROW_NUM, A.* FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY GROUPNO DESC, GROUPORD) AS ROW_NUM, FREE_BOARD.* FROM FREE_BOARD) A WHERE A.ROW_NUM BETWEEN ${beginRecord} AND #{endRecord}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREE_BOARD (FREE_BOARD_NO, WRITER, CONTENT, IP, CREATED, MODIFIED, STATE, DEPTH, GROUP_NO, GROUP_ORD) VALUES (FREE_BOARD_SEQ, #{writer}, #{content}, #{ip}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 1, 0, FREE_BOARD_SEQ.CURRVAL, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE FREE_BOARD SET GROUP_ORD = GROUP_ORD + 1 WHERE GROUP_NO = #{groupNo} AND GROUP_ORD > 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREE_BOARD (FREE_BOARD_NO, WRITER, CONTENT, IP, CREATED, MODIFIED, STATE, DEPTH, GROUP_NO, GROUP_ORD) VALUES (FREE_BOARD_SEQ, #{writer}, #{content}, #{ip}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 1, #{depth}, #{groupNo}, #{groupOrd})
